deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

documentation.text: @dev InvalidProof is thrown on invalid proofs.
@dev UnnecessaryProof is thrown in cases where a proof is supplied without a valid root to match against (root = 0)
@dev InvalidProof is thrown on invalid proofs.
@dev UnnecessaryProof is thrown in cases where a proof is supplied without a valid root to match against (root = 0)

devdoc.author: 0age
devdoc.details: This contract is intended to be called during atomicMatch_ via DELEGATECALL.

InvalidProof().details: InvalidProof is thrown on invalid proofs.

UnnecessaryProof().details: UnnecessaryProof is thrown in cases where a proof is supplied without a valid root to match against (root = 0)

matchERC1155UsingCriteria(address,addres.details: Match an ERC1155 order, ensuring that the supplied proof demonstrates inclusion of the tokenId in the associated merkle root.

params.amount: The amount of ERC1155 tokens with the given tokenId to transfer.
params.from: The account to transfer the ERC1155 token from  this token must first be approved on the seller's AuthenticatedProxy contract.
params.proof: A proof that the supplied tokenId is contained within the associated merkle root. Must be length 0 if root is not set.
params.root: A merkle root derived from each valid tokenId  set to 0 to indicate a collection-level or tokenId-specific order.
params.to: The account to transfer the ERC1155 token to.

returns._0: A boolean indicating a successful match and transfer.

matchERC721UsingCriteria(address,address.details: Match an ERC721 order, ensuring that the supplied proof demonstrates inclusion of the tokenId in the associated merkle root.

params.from: The account to transfer the ERC721 token from  this token must first be approved on the seller's AuthenticatedProxy contract.
params.proof: A proof that the supplied tokenId is contained within the associated merkle root. Must be length 0 if root is not set.
params.root: A merkle root derived from each valid tokenId  set to 0 to indicate a collection-level or tokenId-specific order.
params.to: The account to transfer the ERC721 token to.

returns._0: A boolean indicating a successful match and transfer.

matchERC721WithSafeTransferUsingCriteria.details: Match an ERC721 order using `safeTransferFrom`, ensuring that the supplied proof demonstrates inclusion of the tokenId in the associated merkle root.

params.from: The account to transfer the ERC721 token from  this token must first be approved on the seller's AuthenticatedProxy contract.
params.proof: A proof that the supplied tokenId is contained within the associated merkle root. Must be length 0 if root is not set.
params.root: A merkle root derived from each valid tokenId  set to 0 to indicate a collection-level or tokenId-specific order.
params.to: The account to transfer the ERC721 token to.

returns._0: A boolean indicating a successful match and transfer.

devdoc.title: MerkleValidator enables matching trait-based and collection-based orders for ERC721 and ERC1155 tokens.
